keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: Col. Gulmurod Khalimov, who led an elite police division, vanished last month. In the video, he declares his intention to wage jihad in Central Asia.

headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; Tajikistan: Police Commander Joins ISIS
headline.main: Police Commander From Tajikistan Appears in ISIS Video

snippet: Col. Gulmurod Khalimov, who led an elite police division, vanished last month. In the video, he declares his intention to wage jihad in Central Asia.
abstract: Col Gulmurod Khalimov, senior police officer from Tajikistan who had been missing for a month, appears in online video saying he has joined Islamic State, raising concerns about threat of growing extremism in country.
